title: Coronavirus: Giuseppe Berardelli among 50 priests killed
description: Giuseppe Berardelli who gave his respirator to a patient is among 50 priests killed in Italy so far.
content:
Image copyrightPIERO CRUCIATTIImage caption
 Priests have been celebrating funeral services without relatives in Italy
An Italian priest who gave a respirator to a younger coronavirus patient he did not know has died of the disease.
